name: Thief
description: Masters of stealth, deception, and precision who excel at infiltration, disarming traps, and exploiting enemy weaknesses through cunning rather than brute force.

resource_systems.name: Energy
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers stealth abilities and precision strikes
mechanics: Energy points are spent to perform special stealth maneuvers and precision attacks
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming energy over time
Short rests restore a portion of maximum energy
Depleted energy causes penalties to stealth and attack speed
Can be temporarily boosted through adrenaline in critical situations
Successful stealth kills restore a portion of energy

resource_systems.name: Cunning
resource_systems.description: Mental acuity and tactical awareness that enhances deception and exploitation of weaknesses
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully using stealth or exploiting weaknesses, decreases when detected
mechanics: Increases by 10 when successfully picking locks or disarming traps
Increases by 15 when landing critical strikes from stealth
Decreases by 10 when detected during stealth
Decreases by 15 when failing to pick locks or disarm traps
Can be spent to enhance stealth abilities or execute precision strikes
Higher Cunning increases critical hit chance and damage

class_mechanics.name: Shadow Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Exceptional ability to move unseen and unheard
effects: Can move silently even across noisy surfaces
Able to hide in plain sight with minimal cover
Reduced visibility to detection abilities and magical senses
Can track movement patterns to predict optimal moments for stealth
Presence naturally dims lights in the immediate vicinity

class_mechanics.name: Precision Strikes
class_mechanics.description: Knowledge of vital points and weaknesses in defenses
effects: Increased critical hit chance and damage
Able to identify and exploit weaknesses in enemy armor and defenses
Can target specific body parts for tactical advantages
Attacks have a chance to apply debilitating effects
Can analyze enemy fighting styles to predict and counter movements

class_mechanics.name: Trap Expertise
class_mechanics.description: Skill at detecting, disarming, and setting traps
effects: Can detect hidden traps and mechanisms with heightened perception
Able to disarm complex mechanical and magical traps
Can set improvised traps using available materials
Gains tactical advantages when fighting in trapped areas
Can analyze security systems to identify vulnerabilities

class_mechanics.name: Deception
class_mechanics.description: Mastery of lies, disguise, and misdirection
effects: Can convincingly impersonate others with minimal preparation
Able to detect lies and hidden intentions in conversations
Can create distractions to divert attention
Gains advantages when using feints and misdirection in combat
Can plant false information or evidence with convincing authenticity

skill_trees.name: Shadow Walker
key_abilities: Perfect Stealth: Become nearly invisible even when moving
Shadow Step: Move silently at increased speed
Evasion: Automatically avoid area effects and traps

skill_trees.name: Infiltrator
key_abilities: Master Lockpick: Open even the most complex locks with ease
Trap Sense: Automatically detect nearby traps and mechanisms
Security Expert: Bypass magical and mechanical security systems

skill_trees.name: Backstabber
key_abilities: Vital Strike: Target critical vulnerabilities for massive damage
Exploit Weakness: Identify and target enemy weaknesses
Assassinate: Deal devastating damage to unaware targets

arch_classes.name: Rake
arch_classes.description: Thieves who have refined their skills to become elite infiltrators and manipulators, combining stealth with social cunning and specialized techniques.

lore: Thieves represent the shadowy counterpart to conventional warriors, relying on stealth, precision, and cunning rather than brute force to overcome challenges. Unlike the mystical powers of mages or the divine blessings of clerics, thieves depend on honed skills, quick wits, and intimate knowledge of their targets' vulnerabilities. Their training encompasses not just picking locks and disarming traps but also the arts of deception, disguise, and psychological manipulation, making them versatile operatives in any situation requiring subtlety. Many thieves begin their careers in urban environments, where the complex architecture and social hierarchies provide ample opportunities to develop their unique skill set. Some are formally trained in thieves' guilds or espionage organizations, while others are self-taught survivors who developed their abilities out of necessity. Regardless of their background, all thieves share an appreciation for precision, preparation, and the value of information. In dangerous situations, thieves excel at controlling the battlefield through stealth and misdirection, striking at critical moments and disappearing before enemies can effectively respond. Their ability to bypass obstacles, disable traps, and access restricted areas makes them invaluable members of any adventuring party, opening paths that would be impossible for more direct approaches. Though they may lack the raw power of more combat-focused classes, the versatility and tactical advantages provided by thieves often prove decisive in complex encounters.
